synopsis.text:
Moon lit dreams and mechanical hearts intertwine in the story of Tsubasa, a young boy with aspirations of becoming a Shinki Master. In a world where small, sentient robot girls known as Shinki can converse, battle, and soar through the skies, Tsubasa's life takes a dramatic turn when he discovers an Arnval Mk. 2 Shinki in disrepair. After mending and reactivating her, he affectionately names her Kaguya, inspired by the Moon Princess.

Their peaceful existence is disrupted when Kaguya's former owner and the Shinki manufacturer learn of her escape from the combat testing facility. As Tsubasa and Kaguya prepare for their first Shinki battle, they must confront a powerful and aggressive Shinki sent to retrieve the defiant Arnval Mk. 2.

Join Tsubasa and Kaguya as they navigate the thrilling challenges of Shinki battles and the heartwarming journey of growing up together.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
